entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@realDonaldTrump You're laughable! You gave the ok to transport Americans infected/exposed to Coronavirus on public planes and buses further endangering other Americans!! 

Your level of incompetence and danger to our safety is breathtaking! 🤦🏽‍♂️

#CoronaVirusUpdates 
#TrumpVirus 
#TrumpResign
